author: Morgan Sung
title: Museum asks people to recreate art from household items while social distancing and it's delightful
description: Most people are staying at home, but that doesn't mean we can't appreciate good art. To combat the spread of the coronavirus, the state of California issued a stay at home order last week. That means that all non-essential businesses, including museums, have …
content:
Most people are staying at home, but that doesn't mean we can't appreciate good art.
